nodes.text: Ding Briar was a gas giant–type planet with eighteen moons that occupied the eighth orbital position around the star Abo. It was located within the Lehon system, a part of the Unknown Regions' area known as the Tempered Wastes.
Ding Briar was mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed the Lehon system, and therefore Ding Briar, in grid square G-11.
